conversation.content: Um, hi. I need to—sorry, I mean, uh, I bought this. Last month? No wait. Six weeks. Um.
Oh, um, okay, hi there! I can definitely, uh, help you with that today. Let me just, um, pull up your account here and, er, we'll take a look at what's going on, okay?
Look I know. Not your fault. System's the system.
That's, um, that's really kind of you to say actually. So, uh, can I maybe get your order number? It should be something like, um, ORD and then some numbers after it?
Yeah it's, um, hang on—no that's the—sorry. ORD-4. 4492. Um. LS91?
Perfect, I've got it here. ORD-4492-LS91. I can see this was purchased on October 2nd, so that would make it about... forty-three days ago.
Right. Past thirty days. I get it.
Well, um, so technically yes, but, uh, let me just, hmm, check something here because I think maybe we can, um, you know, work something out?
Really? I just—sorry, I mean, um, I tried the chat thing and they just. Cut me off. You know?
Oh no, I'm so sorry that happened. That must have been really frustrating. Let me dig a little deeper into your account RET-4492-B here.
You're actually. Listening. That's nice.
Of course I am! So, um, I'm looking at your history and, uh, you've been with us for, hmm, three years? And, um, zero returns before this, which is, uh, honestly really impressive.
Yeah I don't—I mean, um, usually stuff works? But this thing just. Stopped. After five weeks.
Okay, so it sounds like maybe this is less about buyer's remorse and more about a defect? Because that changes things quite a bit actually.
Defect. Right. Yes.
So, um, what I'm going to do is, uh, I'm going to file this under warranty claim WRN-8826-QM instead of a return, and, um, that gives us a lot more, er, flexibility with the timing?
Wait you can—um, sorry, you can just. Do that? They said—the chat said no way.
Well, I think the chat system probably just saw the date and auto-declined. But I'm actually looking at your case, and with defective items, we have a ninety-day warranty window, not thirty.
You're really. Helping. Thanks.

Absolutely! So, um, I've approved the warranty return under code WRN-8826-QM, and, uh, you should get an email with the shipping label in, hmm, about five minutes? And, um, we'll get you a replacement as soon as we receive the defective one, okay?
